message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to offer it to you for $20000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $15000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $20000 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $18000. What do you think?
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'll pay $16000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell the product to you for $17500. What do you think?
Thank you for the new offer, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'll pay $16500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
I understand that you're trying to get closer to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell the product to you for $17000. What do you think?
Thank you for the new offer, Alice. I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit short. I'll pay $16250 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
I understand that you're trying to get as close to your budget as possible, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $16750. What do you think?
Thank you for the new offer, Alice. I'm really close to my budget now. I'll pay $16000 for the product. Can you consider my final offer?
